original_text: leave it to the french to truly capture the terrifying angst of the modern working man without turning the film into a cheap thriller , a dumb comedy or a sappy melodrama .
generated_text:
1. "The French have a knack for crafting a cinematic masterpiece that delves into the existential crisis of the modern professional without resorting to cheap thrills or sentimental sap."
2. "Leave it to the French to create a film that masterfully conveys the anxiety of the modern working individual without succumbing to clichés or melodrama."
